BadgeDetail.Name: Communication
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this composite badge has demonstrated they have strong communication skills. They are able to communicate effectively both verbally and in written form and adapt their style according to the situation. Additionally, they are both numerate and digitally literate. To earn this badge they have earned the following badges: Verbal communication, Written communication, Numeracy & Digital Literacy.

Task.Title: Earn the badges
Task.Body: Earn the following badges:Verbal communicationWritten communicationNumeracyDigital Literacy
Task.HtmlBody:
Earn the following badges:

  • Verbal communication
  • Written communication
  • Numeracy
  • Digital Literacy
